reviewText: This is a lovely movie of three men. They tell their storis of comming out and their lives in the bear community in the northeast. It does show them attending a few of the bear runs in that area.

BEAR RUN was thought provoking and moving.  I really connected with many of the characters.  I originally watched it on Logo.  It was much better watching it without all of the commercial breaks.  This documentary is a beautiful tribute to the Bear Community!
